location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter acknowledges Bruce's letter of 5 February 1811 and asks Bruce to report on how the Joasimese [Āl Qāsimī] tribe called Ejmaun [Ajman] could have escaped the notice of Captain John Wainwright and Colonel Smith.
